Maybe this has already been done, or perhaps been discussed, but I 
couldn'=
t find any previous threads for it. My idea is: a way to play 
with people =
over direct connect, or Local Area Network. I'm a huge fan 
of the game and=
 have friends that would play it with me if they didn't 
have to drive to m=
y house to play with me (since they mostly go to 
colleges now that are hou=
rs away). I'm not very program savvy when it 
comes to games so I'm not rea=
l sure what in the world to do here. If 
anyone has any idea's for this ple=
ase let me know, either here or 
email me roby@...

ry much
